name: Processors
description: Processors are a key component of modern computers. This category covers a variety of models designed for different needs and purposes, including gaming systems, workstations, servers, and general purpose computers.

name: Motherboards
description: The motherboard is the base on which other key components such as the processor, RAM, graphics card and other devices are installed. This category offers a variety of models to suit different user needs and types of computer systems.

name: Graphics Cards
description: We offer a diverse range of graphics accelerators. Video cards are designed for graphics applications including gaming, video processing, professional design, and other tasks that require high visualization performance.

name: Memory
description: RAM, or Random Access Memory, plays a key role in computer performance and efficiency because it temporarily stores the data that the operating system and applications are currently working with.

name: Drives
description: This category includes hard disk drives (HDDs) and solid state drives (SSDs), which play an important role in storing and quickly accessing information. HDDs offer large capacity and a more affordable price, while SSDs provide faster data read and write speeds

name: Power Supplies
description: This product category includes various models and types of devices designed to provide power to computer systems. Power supplies (PSUs) play a key role in converting electricity from standard sources into the necessary voltages to operate computer components.

name: Computer Cases
description: We stock a diverse selection of Computer Enclosures designed to house and protect the components of a computer system. These enclosures not only provide physical integration of all internal devices, but can also affect the cooling, soundproofing and appearance of the computer.
